item.description:
MC^2 is a bit too formal, but quiet & well lit, so we'll stick with it for now. Take Red line to Kendall sq stop, or park at Marriott garage. We'll have a >H sign on the table , if you ask the waiter for a meetup he should know where we are.
But I am open to suggestions, please post or email if this date/time or venue don't work for you
item.name: The Boston Transhumanists April Meeting
